thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com
thread.title: Pauline

author: Pauline
title: Pauline
text: I enjoy receiving my box on my doorstep. No need to include food shopping in my weekend activities. The contents of the box is good quality meats and vegetables but some meals have less contents than others. However they are well portioned out per serving. The meals are very quick and easy and great for cooks who are starting out and need to follow directions. All in all I am very pleased but wish I had more choices to pick from.
